locations.map: Feed the Darmanitan Statue a RageCandyBar to activate the fight. Get it to half its health to change its form for the additional Dex Entry. If you catch it in that state, then it will recover in the PC. However, you will not get the Regular Darmanitan Form tacted onto your Dex, so you will need to seek out a friend to trade it to him and back.
Relic Castle (2nd Floor, 3rd Floor, 4th Floor, 5th Floor, and 6th Floor)
